job.title: Electrical Engineers
job.description:
Our Client is looking for Electrical Engineers for multiple roles in Irvine/ milpitas CA for contract positions. Please review the Job descriptions below and let us know if you are interested and fit for any of the jobs. 


Please apply at: ravinder@vsvwins.com/ 510 560 4649 


Automation Electrical Engineer - Irvine

Project: Design and Process the automation integrated circuits and wiring for manufacturing companies

• Electrical PCB Test engineer, Product test engineer, and design engineer for the schematics and wiring panels of the PA Solutions’ Projects

• Work on Ladder Logic designs in CAD and PLC designs in Direct Logic Software with NEC requirements and apply them to electrical designs to provide panel layouts to shop electrical technician


Motion Control Electrical Engineer – Milpitas

5+ years of industry experience in developing electric motor controls systems and related products

• Hands-on experience in using simulation tools – MATLAB/Simulink, PLECS, PSIM, etc.

• Ability to understand the software architecture and codes implemented in LabView, C, C++

• Knowledge and experience in failure (fault) analysis methodologies - FMEA, FTA, etc

• Extensive experience in embedded system designs including micro-processor, FPGA, micro-controller, DSP and basic electric circuits is a plus.

• Knowledge and experience in classic and advanced control theories and applications is a plus.


Electrical Engineer - Milpitas

Subsystem testing and analysis

• Design iterations of PCB (Schematics)

• Hardware design documentation



3D printed electronics Electrical Engineer – Cincinnati

provide technical leadership for projects in the areas of sensors and circuit design for 3D Printed Electronics, Processing and Conductive/Non-conductive Ink Development

• support the development of long-term strategy for 3D Printed Electronics, sensors and Processes

• implement cost effective 3D Printing and material-related manufacturing solutions to drive engineering efficiencies.

• conduct detailed product/process design reviews


Thank you.

Ravi

ravinder@vsvwins.com/ 510 560 4649
